entry.title: BLOWING SNOW ADVISORY , Fermont
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:38 AM EST Sunday 05 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -9.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Wabush Airport 12:32 PM AST Sunday 05 March 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -9.6°C

Visibility: 3.2 km
Humidity: 67 %

Dewpoint: -14.6°C

Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday: Snow. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning early this afternoon. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 19 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Sunday 05 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow and blowing snow. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Snow and blowing snow. Amount 10 cm. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 21 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Sunday 05 March 2023
